name: Conqueror
description: Battlemasters who seek to dominate and subjugate through overwhelming force and intimidation, crushing opposition beneath their might and ruling through fear and absolute power.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and domination techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 during combat, +10 when dominating opponents
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform devastating combat maneuvers and intimidation techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to intimidation abilities and dominating presence
Can be temporarily boosted through rage in critical situations
Successful domination of opponents restores a portion of stamina

resource_systems.name: Combat Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration and battlefield awareness that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 20 when landing critical hits or successfully intimidating opponents
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 20 when intimidation attempts fail or are resisted
Decreases by 15 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance intimidation abilities or execute devastating techniques
Higher Combat Focus increases critical damage and intimidation effectiveness

resource_systems.name: Command Authority
resource_systems.description: Measure of dominating presence and ability to control others through fear
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully intimidating opponents or demonstrating overwhelming power
mechanics: Increases by 15 when forcing enemies to submit through intimidation
Increases by 20 when demonstrating overwhelming power through devastating attacks
Decreases by 15 when intimidation attempts are resisted or countered
Decreases by 20 when personally suffering humiliation or defeat
Can be spent to issue powerful intimidation abilities that control enemies
Higher Command Authority increases the effectiveness of fear-based abilities

resource_systems.name: Dominance
resource_systems.description: Measure of overwhelming power and ability to subjugate others through force
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully dominating opponents or crushing resistance
mechanics: Increases by 15 when defeating powerful opponents in humiliating ways
Increases by 10 when forcing submission through overwhelming force
Decreases by 15 when domination attempts are successfully resisted
Decreases by 10 when forced to retreat or acknowledge another's superiority
Can be spent to execute devastating displays of power or break enemy will
At maximum Dominance, enter a state of terrifying battlefield supremacy

class_mechanics.name: Overwhelming Force
class_mechanics.description: Combat style that emphasizes devastating power and crushing opponents
effects: Can perform attacks of such power they shatter defenses and break spirits
Able to channel rage and aggression into increased combat effectiveness
Can execute devastating finishing moves that serve as examples to others
Presence naturally intimidates lesser opponents through sheer power projection
Can break enemy morale through displays of overwhelming strength

class_mechanics.name: Intimidating Presence
class_mechanics.description: Aura of fear and dominance that breaks enemy will to fight
effects: Can project an aura of dread that weakens enemy resolve
Able to target specific enemies with focused intimidation
Can break enemy morale through terrifying displays of power
Presence causes hesitation and fear in opponents before combat begins
Can force weaker enemies to flee or surrender through sheer intimidation

class_mechanics.name: Rule Through Fear
class_mechanics.description: Leadership style based on intimidation and absolute authority
effects: Can command allies through fear and intimidation rather than respect
Able to punish disobedience in ways that ensure future compliance
Can establish dominance hierarchies that function through fear
Presence naturally establishes you at the top of any power structure
Can break resistance to authority through examples of terrible punishment

class_mechanics.name: Ruthless Domination
class_mechanics.description: Willingness to use any means necessary to achieve dominance
effects: Can identify and exploit any weakness without moral hesitation
Able to sacrifice pawns and lesser allies for personal advantage
Can use cruel and unusual tactics that break enemy spirit
Presence encourages similar ruthlessness in subordinates
Can achieve victory through methods others would find unconscionable

signature_abilities.name: Reign of Terror
signature_abilities.description: Project an overwhelming aura of dread that breaks enemy will to fight
mechanics: For 3 minutes, emit an aura of terror that affects all enemies within 50 meters
Weaker enemies flee in terror or cower in submission
Stronger enemies suffer significant penalties to attack, defense, and morale
Each successful intimidation extends duration by 10 seconds
Can focus the terror effect on specific targets for enhanced effect
Costs 100 Stamina, 50 Command Authority, and 75 Dominance

signature_abilities.name: Crushing Dominance
signature_abilities.description: Demonstrate overwhelming power that forces submission and breaks resistance
mechanics: For 5 minutes, all attacks have increased chance to stun, knockdown, or demoralize
Successful attacks against the same target stack increasing penalties
Can execute devastating finishing moves that serve as examples to other enemies
Defeated enemies may become temporary thralls who fight for you out of fear
Presence alone causes weaker enemies to hesitate before attacking
Costs 75 Stamina, 100 Command Authority, and 50 Dominance

signature_abilities.name: Tyrant Ascendant
signature_abilities.description: Transform into the embodiment of domination and tyrannical power
mechanics: For 3 minutes, transform into a terrifying embodiment of conquering might
Size increases by 50%, strength and charisma doubled
Each attack has a chance to break enemy will, forcing temporary submission
Voice carries supernatural authority that can command even resistant enemies
Presence alone forces weaker enemies to kneel in submission
Costs 50 Stamina, 75 Command Authority, and 100 Dominance

lore: Conquerors represent the most dominating path a Battlemaster can take, having dedicated their martial prowess and leadership abilities to subjugating others through overwhelming force and fear. These masters of intimidation have transcended ordinary combat leadership to become terrifying figures of absolute authority, capable of breaking enemy will through sheer presence and forcing submission from all but the most resolute opponents. The path to becoming a Conqueror requires not only exceptional combat skills and tactical acumen but also a ruthless mindset that prioritizes dominance and control over all other considerations. Those who succeed find themselves capable of commanding through fear rather than respect, their very presence causing lesser warriors to question their resolve to fight. Conquerors typically serve as warlords of conquered territories, leaders of feared military forces, or personal enforcers for tyrannical rulers. Many establish their own domains through force, ruling with an iron fist and crushing any who dare to challenge their authority. Some even become legendary figures of such terrifying reputation that entire regions surrender rather than face their wrath. Their combination of overwhelming combat power, intimidating presence, and ruthless determination makes them feared opponents in any conflict, where their ability to break enemy morale before battle is even joined can prevent resistance from forming in the first place. Though they may lack the noble inspiration of Champions or the tactical precision of Warlords, the dominating presence and fear-inducing capabilities of Conquerors make them perhaps the most psychologically devastating battlefield commanders when submission through overwhelming force is the primary objective.
